00001 /* Date slider element, Ajaxorized.com,  2008 */
00002 var sliderReference;
00003 
00004 /* Extend the data element a bit */
00005 Date.prototype.getDiffDays = function(p_oDate) {
00006         p_iOneDay = 1000*60*60*24;
00007         return Math.ceil((p_oDate.getTime()-this.getTime())/(p_iOneDay));
00008 }
00009 
00010 /* The dateslider */
00011 DateSlider = Class.create({
00012         initialize : function(p_sBarId, p_sStartDate, p_sEndDate, p_iStartYear, p_iEndYear) {
00013                 /* Start */
00014                 this.barStartDate = Date.parse(p_iStartYear+'-01-01');
00015 
00016                 this.iStartYear = p_iStartYear;
00017                 this.iEndYear = p_iEndYear;
00018                 
00019                 /* Panel dates */
00020                 this.oStartDate = Date.parse(p_sStartDate);
00021                 this.oEndDate = Date.parse(p_sEndDate);         
00022 
00023                 /* The fields (set later) */
00024                 this.oStartField = null;
00025                 this.oEndFiedl = null;
00026         
00027                 sliderReference = this;
00028                 
00029                 this.sliderBarMargin = 2;
00030                 
00031                 l_oStartDate = Date.parse(p_sStartDate);
00032                 l_oEndDate = Date.parse(p_sEndDate);
00033                 
00034                 this.iLeftOffsetLH = this.barStartDate.getDiffDays(l_oStartDate);
00035                 this.iLeftOffsetRH = this.barStartDate.getDiffDays(l_oEndDate);                 
00036                 
00037                 this.dayDivWidth = 1;
00038                 this.createSliderBar(p_sBarId);
00039                 this.createHandles(p_sBarId, p_sStartDate, p_sEndDate);
00040                 this.createShiftPanel(p_sBarId, p_sStartDate, p_sEndDate);
00041         },
00042         createSliderBar : function(p_sBarId) {
00043                 /* Create the yearlabels */
00044                 var sliderDayDivWidth = this.dayDivWidth;
00045 
00046                 l_iYear = this.iStartYear;
00047                 while(l_iYear <= this.iEndYear) {               
00048                         l_oData = Date.parse('01-01-'+l_iYear);
00049                         if(l_oData.isLeapYear()) iDays = 366; else iDays = 365;  
00050                         
00051                         divWidth = sliderDayDivWidth*iDays;
00052                         l_oDiv = $(Builder.node('div', {className : 'slideYear', style : 'width:'+(divWidth-1)+'px'})).update(l_iYear);
00053                         
00054                         iTotalDays = 0;
00055                         (12).times(function(e) {
00056                                 monthDivWidth = l_oData.getDaysInMonth();
00057                                 l_oMonthDiv = Builder.node('div', {className : 'slideMonth',style : 'width:'+(monthDivWidth)+'px; left:'+iTotalDays+'px'});
00058                                 if(e==0) { 
00059                                         $(l_oMonthDiv).addClassName('firstMonth');
00060                                 } else {
00061                                         $(l_oMonthDiv).update(l_oData.toString("MMM"));
00062                                 }
00063                                 l_oDiv.appendChild(l_oMonthDiv);
00064                                 iTotalDays += monthDivWidth;
00065                                 l_oData.addMonths(1);
00066                         });
00067                         $(p_sBarId).appendChild(l_oDiv);
00068                         l_iYear++;
00069                 }
00070                 
00071                 /* Set the the right position and length */
00072                 
00073                 l_iCorrection = $('slider-container').offsetWidth/2;
00074                 l_shiftLeft = 0-(this.barStartDate.getDiffDays(Date.today()))+l_iCorrection;
00075                 l_oFinishDate = Date.parse((this.iEndYear+1)+'-01-01');
00076                 iBarWidth =this.barStartDate.getDiffDays(l_oFinishDate);
00077                 $('sliderbar').setStyle({left : l_shiftLeft+'px', width : iBarWidth+'px'});     
00078                 new Draggable($(p_sBarId), {constraint:'horizontal', starteffect : '', endeffect:'', zindex:'0'});
00079         },
00080         createHandles : function(p_sBarId, p_sStartDate, p_sEndDate) {
00081                 /* Calculate positions */
00082                 l_oLeftHandle = $(Builder.node('span', {id : 'lefthandle', style:'left:'+this.iLeftOffsetLH+'px'})).update('&nbsp;');
00083                 l_oRightHandle = $(Builder.node('span', {id : 'righthandle', style:'left:'+this.iLeftOffsetRH+'px'})).update('&nbsp;');
00084                 
00085                 $(p_sBarId).appendChild(l_oLeftHandle);
00086                 $(p_sBarId).appendChild(l_oRightHandle);
00087 
00088                 new Draggable(l_oLeftHandle,  {constraint:'horizontal', onDrag :  sliderReference._leftDrag, onEnd : sliderReference._leftDrag});
00089                                                                                                                 
00090 
00091                 new Draggable(l_oRightHandle,  {constraint:'horizontal', onDrag : sliderReference._rightDrag, onEnd : sliderReference._rightDrag });    
00092         },
00093         createShiftPanel : function(p_sBarId, p_sStartDate, p_sEndDate) {
00094                 /* Calculate width */
00095                 l_iBarWidth = (this.iLeftOffsetRH-this.iLeftOffsetLH)+(2*this.sliderBarMargin);
00096 
00097                 l_oShiftPanel = $(Builder.node('div', {id : 'shiftpanel', style:'left:'+(this.iLeftOffsetLH)+'px; width:'+l_iBarWidth+'px'}));
00098                 $(p_sBarId).appendChild(l_oShiftPanel);         
00099                 new Draggable(l_oShiftPanel, {constraint:'horizontal', starteffect : '', endeffect:'', zindex:'0', onDrag : function() { 
00100                                                                                                                         /* Set the handlers while dragging the shiftpanel */
00101                                                                                                                         $('lefthandle').setStyle({left: ($('shiftpanel').offsetLeft-sliderReference.sliderBarMargin)+'px'});
00102                                                                                                                         $('righthandle').setStyle({left: ($('shiftpanel').offsetLeft + $('shiftpanel').offsetWidth-sliderReference.sliderBarMargin)+'px'});                                             
00103                                                                                                                         sliderReference._setDates();
00104                                                                                                                         }});    
00105         },
00106         _setDates : function() {
00107                 /* Get the position of the handles */
00108                 l_iLeftPos = $('lefthandle').offsetLeft;
00109                 l_iRightPos = $('righthandle').offsetLeft;
00110                 
00111                 l_oDate = this.barStartDate.clone().addDays(l_iLeftPos);
00112                 l_oDate2 = this.barStartDate.clone().addDays(l_iRightPos);
00113     
00114     if(l_oDate.toString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss")>l_oDate2.toString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss")) {
00115       var temp = l_oDate;
00116       l_oDate = l_oDate2;
00117       l_oDate2 = temp;
00118     }
00119         
00120                 if(this.oStartField && this.oEndField) {
00121                         this.oStartField.setValue(l_oDate.toString(Date.CultureInfo.formatPatterns.shortDate));         
00122                         this.oEndField.setValue(l_oDate2.toString(Date.CultureInfo.formatPatterns.shortDate));          
00123                 }
00124                 
00125         },
00126         _rightDrag : function () {
00127                 l_panelLength = $('righthandle').offsetLeft - $('lefthandle').offsetLeft - 5;
00128     if(l_panelLength<0) {
00129       l_panelLength = Math.abs(l_panelLength)-4;
00130       left: $('shiftpanel').setStyle({left : ($('righthandle').offsetLeft)+'px'});
00131     }
00132                 $('shiftpanel').setStyle({width : (l_panelLength+2*sliderReference.sliderBarMargin)+'px'});                                                                                                                                     
00133                 sliderReference._setDates();    
00134         },
00135         _leftDrag : function() {
00136                 l_panelLength = $('righthandle').offsetLeft - $('lefthandle').offsetLeft - 4;
00137     if(l_panelLength<0) {
00138       l_panelLength = Math.abs(l_panelLength)-5;
00139       left: $('shiftpanel').setStyle({left : ($('righthandle').offsetLeft)+'px'});
00140     } else left: $('shiftpanel').setStyle({left: ($('lefthandle').offsetLeft+4)+'px'});
00141                 $('shiftpanel').setStyle({width : l_panelLength+'px'});                                                                                                                 
00142                 sliderReference._setDates();            
00143         },
00144         morphTo : function (p_oDateStart, p_oDateEnd) {
00145                 l_offsetLeftLH = this.barStartDate.getDiffDays(l_oStartDate);
00146                 l_offsetLeftRH = this.barStartDate.getDiffDays(p_oDateEnd);
00147                 l_panelLength = l_offsetLeftRH - l_offsetLeftLH  - 4;
00148                 $('lefthandle').morph('left:'+l_offsetLeftLH+'px');
00149                 $('righthandle').morph('left:'+l_offsetLeftRH+'px');
00150                 $('shiftpanel').morph('width : '+(l_panelLength+2*sliderReference.sliderBarMargin)+'px; left : '+(l_offsetLeftLH+2)+'px');                                                                                                                                                      
00151         },
00152         attachFields : function (p_oStartField, p_oEndField) {
00153                 this.oStartField = p_oStartField;
00154                 this.oEndField = p_oEndField;
00155                 
00156                 p_oStartField.setValue(this.oStartDate.toString(Date.CultureInfo.formatPatterns.shortDate));
00157                 p_oEndField.setValue(this.oEndDate.toString(Date.CultureInfo.formatPatterns.shortDate));
00158                 
00159                 p_oStartField.observe('blur', function(e) {
00160                         /* Morph to the new date */
00161                         l_oStartDate = Date.parse(p_oStartField.getValue());
00162                         l_oEndDate = Date.parse(p_oEndField.getValue());
00163       if(l_oStartDate.toString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss")>l_oEndDate.toString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss")) {
00164         var temp = l_oStartDate;
00165         l_oStartDate = l_oEndDate;
00166         l_oEndDate = temp;
00167         p_oStartField.setValue(l_oStartDate.toString(Date.CultureInfo.formatPatterns.shortDate));
00168         p_oEndField.setValue(l_oEndDate.toString(Date.CultureInfo.formatPatterns.shortDate));
00169       }
00170                         sliderReference.morphTo(l_oStartDate, l_oEndDate);
00171                 });     
00172                 
00173                 p_oEndField.observe('blur', function(e) {
00174                         /* Morph to the new date */
00175                         l_oStartDate = Date.parse(p_oStartField.getValue());
00176                         l_oEndDate = Date.parse(p_oEndField.getValue());
00177       if(l_oStartDate.toString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss")>l_oEndDate.toString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss")) {
00178         var temp = l_oStartDate;
00179         l_oStartDate = l_oEndDate;
00180         l_oEndDate = temp;
00181         p_oStartField.setValue(l_oStartDate.toString(Date.CultureInfo.formatPatterns.shortDate));
00182         p_oEndField.setValue(l_oEndDate.toString(Date.CultureInfo.formatPatterns.shortDate));
00183       }
00184                         sliderReference.morphTo(l_oStartDate, l_oEndDate);
00185                 });                                                     
00186                 
00187         }
00188 });
